subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Baltimore Orioles shortstop Miguel Tejada was placed on the 15-day disabled list yesterday with a nondisplaced fracture of his left wrist, ending his streak of consecutive games played at 1,152, the fifth longest in major league history.
snippet: Baltimore Orioles shortstop Miguel Tejada was placed on the 15-day disabled list yesterday with a nondisplaced fracture of his left wrist, ending his streak of consecutive games played at 1,152, the fifth longest in major league history.
